duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide specialized care to patients in the telemetry unit, monitoring vital signs, and interpreting data to care for acutely ill patients.
Collaborate with healthcare professionals to develop and implement patient care plans.
Maintain accurate and detailed medical records of patients' conditions and treatments.
Respond to medical emergencies and provide immediate care in critical situations.
Utilize critical thinking to assess and respond to changes in patients' conditions, providing appropriate treatment and support.
Demonstrate empathy and compassion in interactions with patients and their families, providing emotional support and education.
Work collaboratively with a multidisciplinary healthcare team to ensure comprehensive patient care.
Adhere to hospital protocols, policies, and procedures to ensure patient safety and quality care.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing, RN licensure (Master's preferred for advanced practice roles)
